test_items.name: openfeature-node-server-setup
test_items.description: Validates OpenFeature Node provider setup with FeatBit for server-side applications
test_items.input_task_prompt: How do I use FeatBit with OpenFeature in my Node.js backend? Show me provider setup and flag evaluation in an Express route.
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- Install @openfeature/server-sdk and @featbit/openfeature-provider-node-server
- Import FeatBitProvider
- OpenFeature.setProvider() with async
- EvaluationContext for user
- await client.getBooleanValue()
- Provider initialization wait

Evaluation Method:
1. Check correct packages listed
2. Verify async provider setup
3. Confirm context usage
4. Check async evaluation
5. Verify server-side patterns

Pass Criteria:
- Server SDK packages correct
- Async patterns used
- Context properly structured
- OpenFeature API correct
- Server-appropriate example

Fail Criteria:
- Client SDK packages
- Synchronous patterns
- Missing context
- Incorrect API usage
